title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin defends Jimmy Garoppolo from all the criticism he's received as a "game manager" and why he's more valuable than what he's given credit for. He points out Joe Burrow's rise in only his second year in the NFL and why his success is putting more pressure on other young QBs in the league. He gives you his predictions for the AFC & NFC Championship games. Plus, long time NFL reporter Peter King joins the show to tell Colin if Tom Brady is ready to retire and if Aaron Rodgers is done playing for the Packers. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
